articles.title: Amazon says no to remote work - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy is calling for a full return to office at the start of 2025. For the last 15 months, employees have been expected to work in the
articles.content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassyis calling for a full return to office at the start of 2025. For the last 15 months, employees have been expected to work in the office three days per week. Now employees will be… [+4149 chars]
